name: ChatHudLineHelper
description: The ChatHudLineHelper class provides a wrapper for individual chat HUD lines, allowing script writers to interact with and manipulate chat messages that have been displayed in the client's chat interface.
overview:
The ChatHudLineHelper class represents a single line in the chat HUD, providing access to:
- The text content of the chat line
- The tick when the message was created
- Methods to delete specific messages
- Access to the underlying Minecraft ChatHudLine object through the BaseHelper interface

ChatHudLineHelper objects are typically obtained through the ChatHistoryManager methods like getRecvLine(), getRecvLines(), or from chat-related events.

methods.name: getText
methods.description: Retrieves the text content of the chat line.

methods.name: getCreationTick
methods.description: Retrieves the tick when the message was created.

methods.name: deleteById
methods.description: Deletes the specific message from the client-side chat HUD.
